summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Municipal Court; authorizing execution, pursuant to the Interlocal Cooperation Act, of an agreement with the Washington State Department of Social and Health Services regarding the funding of a part-time State of Washington Funding Services Specialist in the Seattle Municipal Court Resource Center to provide screening services to Court defendants and the community; declaring an emergency; and ratifying and confirming certain acts, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
committee: Public Safety, Governmental Relations and Arts
